column4: is there any index of packages from several of the popular repositories? ubuntuguide says p7zip-full exists for dapper, but i can't tell which repository i need to add
universe
are you sure that applies to dapper? i don't see it..
yep
not p7zip
the difference is that that's the dependency acetoneiso requires
no
it can extract daa's
i know how to mount iso's
read the whole thing
daa's not listed there
so anyway... do you know how to find out what repo to add?
I would just open the acetone deb and change the dependency from p7zip-full to p7zip
hmmmm
why are you still using dapper, is this a server?
no, it's company-issued distro
rules against upgrading?
no, it would just be a pain
no, that's not what i mean
there's a ton of extra shit in the company issued distro
but I would assume that it is all contained in a deb?
no, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goobuntu
just fyi, i've been reading through acetone. it's totally shady!! it actually downloads and runs a poweriso binary from the acetone-team.org website, and uses that to do all the conversions.
